/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The buildings, predominantly gray and red, exhibit a traditional Chinese architectural style, adding a touch of historical charm to the modern cityscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the expansive sky.
